spine_hook: Success = footfall +10–15% (stretch ≥25%), early-window share 20–30%, and event CPA ≤0.80× baseline while QR redemptions ≥5% of footfall.

anchors.headline: Foot-traffic uplift target for partner-led activations
anchors.expression: Footfall +10–15% vs comparable non-promo weekend in pilot stores

anchors.headline: Early-window share baseline and goal
anchors.expression: Current early-window share = 12–15% of event transactions; goal = 20–30%

anchors.headline: Event CPA guardrail
anchors.expression: Event CPA ≤ 0.80× baseline CPA for the promotional period

anchors.headline: QR redemption floor as activation lift proxy
anchors.expression: QR-enabled offers redeemed by ≥5% of store footfall during activation windows

measurement_plan.expression: Achieve CPA ≤ 0.80× baseline over Nov 22–29 for stores in the pilot compared to matched-control stores
measurement_plan.notes: Use matched-control stores (same AUR and weekly footfall) and include partner-funded ad offsets in CPA denominator.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Proves partner-funded activations preserve acquisition efficiency vs blanket discounts.

measurement_plan.metric: Buyer activity share vs promo intensity
measurement_plan.expression: Measure early-window share = 20–30% while promo SKU share remains ≈ LY or lower
measurement_plan.notes: Track early-window transactions, % of SKUs on promo, and depth of markdowns daily. Report paired chart.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Paired metrics show whether early-buyer growth is coming from converted new buyers or deeper markdowns.

measurement_plan.expression: Footfall uplift 10–15% (stretch ≥25%) in pilot stores vs matched-control weekend
measurement_plan.notes: Deploy footfall sensors and hourly door counts. Compare same-day LY and matched-control stores.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Direct test of whether co-branded activations drive incremental store visits compared with blanket discounts.

measurement_plan.expression: Model event-level P&L showing net margin and CPA under (A) 20% blanket discount and (B) co-funded 15% collaboration + media value
measurement_plan.timeframe: Prior to pilot launch; finalize by 2025-11-08
measurement_plan.notes: Include partner ad credits, incremental store revenue, and assumed carryover sales. Run sensitivity on conversion lift ±5pp.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Quantifies tradeoffs and shows whether partner funding replaces markdowns while protecting CPA.
